## PopulatableEthersKumo.adjustTrove() method

Adjust existing Trove by changing its collateral, debt, or both.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
adjustTrove(params: TroveAdjustmentParams<Decimalish>, asset: string, maxBorrowingRateOrOptionalParams?: Decimalish | BorrowingOperationOptionalParams, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedEthersKumoTransaction<TroveAdjustmentDetails>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [TroveAdjustmentParams](./lib-base.troveadjustmentparams.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Parameters of the adjustment. |
|  asset | string |  |
|  maxBorrowingRateOrOptionalParams | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) \| [BorrowingOperationOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.borrowingoperationoptionalparams.md) |  |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedEthersKumoTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedetherskumotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

The transaction will fail if the Trove's debt would fall below [KUSD\_MINIMUM\_DEBT](./lib-base.kusd_minimum_debt.md)<!-- -->.

If `maxBorrowingRate` is omitted, the current borrowing rate plus 0.5% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
